title: Mayur Jhumka: Regal Peacock Earrings with Polki and Pearl
materials: Cultured South Sea Pearl. Crafted with Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Inspired by traditional Mayur (peacock) motifs, these Jhumkas feature a beautifully enameled peacock body above a crescent of Polki diamonds. A bell-shaped Jhumka with diamond detailing leads to a lustrous pearl drop. The Polki setting showcases the inherent beauty of the uncut diamonds, creating a regal and opulent look. The design incorporates elements of temple jewelry with a modern twist.
colors: and Cream (Pearl). A classic South Indian color palette with rich jewel tones.
occasions: and festive occasions (Panduga). Also suitable for making a statement at contemporary parties and events.
description: These Mayur Jhumkas blend traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and a lustrous South Sea pearl ensures a timeless elegance. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, love, and prosperity, making this piece a meaningful and valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Expertly crafted with meticulous attention to detail and Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine and quality. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
